Its a classic fps , played by so many generations. I might have so little playtime in this account, but I've played thousands of hours when I was a kid , with classmates and friends at internet cafe's. Despite the graphics being "bad" for today's standards and for the expectations of new generations, I would definitely recommend it.
This game has many many maps and also many different mods and type of games. My favorite were : Hide & seek and Deathruns. One big reason for someone to play this game in 2021, is that it can run on a potato pc with stable fps , plus, it is the perfect way for someone who is entering the fps genre on pc gaming and is slowly building a gaming rig...You dont even need a graphics card to run it on old 10+year old intel processors.

Maybe I'm biased because I really like the source engine games in general, but still this is the perfect balance between 1.6 and Global Offensive, while the first I consider to be really old and quite inaccurate during gameplay and the latter being way too flashy, and just another release of the franchise, giving away the Call of Duty vibes.
